thread.title: Will UK sugar tax take fizz out of drinks industry?

title: Will UK sugar tax take fizz out of drinks industry?
text:
Will UK sugar tax take fizz out of drinks industry? Friday, April 06, 2018 - 01:48 
Britain's sugar tax on soft drinks came into effect on Friday, a move that will lead to some higher prices as the country seeks to battle childhood obesity. Kate King looks at whether it may also mean slimmer margins for drinks manufacturers.   
Britain's sugar tax on soft drinks came into effect on Friday, a move that will lead to some higher prices as the country seeks to battle childhood obesity. Kate King looks at whether it may also mean slimmer margins for drinks manufacturers.  //reut.rs/2JlF7et
